labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The window stays the same (tinier than previously) and you can't fullscreen, avatars overlap on the right
data.expected_result: The window is bigger and you can fullscreen the DM video
data.short_description: Voice + Video Call is too tiny when in DM + large video doesn't work (on the right, avatars are overlapping due to that)
data.steps_to_repro: - update canary to 20386 - get into a call with someone and let them turn on video screen - notice that the video window is tinier than in previous builds - try to press the button that makes the video larger (bottom left)
